summary: Completed comprehensive frontend testing of Clara website with brutalist design. Most functionality working correctly with minor overlay issues in mobile menu and modal close buttons.

ui_bugs.issue: Menu overlay prevents proper close functionality - close button not clickable due to nav-links overlay interception
Modal close button has overlay interception issues - video element blocks click events

integration_issues.issue: Page experiences timeout on networkidle due to video loading - affects navigation timing

passed_tests: Homepage loads with brutalist design (black/white contrast, JetBrains Mono font, lowercase typography)
SEO meta tags present (description, og:title, twitter:card, structured data)
Navigation works for presenca-digital, metodo, contacto pages
Contact form displays and functions with Formspree integration
Image modal functionality works (opens with click, closes with ESC)
Videos have proper autoplay, muted, loop attributes
Video modal opens and displays videos with controls
Page animations and scroll reveal effects working
Robots.txt and sitemap.xml present and properly configured
success_percentage: frontend: 85% - Core functionality working, minor overlay issues need fixing
action_item_for_main_agent: Fix mobile menu and modal overlay issues: 1) Mobile hamburger menu close button blocked by nav-links overlay, 2) Video modal close button blocked by video element overlay. Consider adding z-index fixes or click event handling improvements.
